Alma tries to escape but feeling dizzy, faints and dies on her way.

title: Old South Pittsburg Hospital Haunted Commercial
Totem & Taboo
description: It's a story about a hunter who suffers from paranoia and hallucinations after hiding the accidental murder of an old hermit. This prevents him from keeping his passions repressed and makes him turns against his wife and daughter. It's 'The Shining' meets 'Jacob's Ladder'.

title: Blood Was Everywhere
description: The nightmare of the unsolved, random murder is brought to life: A faceless killer wreaks havoc on the lives of average people in a small Massachusetts town.

title: 2 channeru no noroi: Gekijôban
description: The Shark Island Incident was thought to be a joke, with 2chan users discussing a fictitious incident in a setting where they were not allowed to talk about it with other 2chan users. However, the threads were posted as usual.

title: Purple Haze
description: Purple Haze is a movie about a talented musician from Haiti. The CEO of Colossal Records got wind of this raw talented musician and signed him to a deal. Sam Lucci the owner of Colossal Records is not the most honest business man. Damian Ship aka Purple Haze is not that familiar with the record business. When Sam decide to swindle Damian of his money, he get a lesson in true voodoo economics.

title: The Mystery Of Morgus
description: "The Mystery Of Morgus" was a documentary of Sidney Noel Rideau and his horror host character of "Dr. Morgus".

title: Regissören
description: A director falls into insanity because of the films he is making, and we follow his attempt at making his last film, an anthology of surreal films.

title: Chaman
description: A woman travels through the desert trying to escape her fear of reality.

title: Total Skull Halloween
description: The little Devil's Rejects and Michael Myers go head to head at The Myers House NC in this official TOTAL SKULL Halloween promo video for Sheri Moon Zombie's clothing line TOTAL SKULL.

title: Gehenna
description: The sheriff must overcome his fear of the bitter-cold outside, two-bit criminals, and feelings of solitude in what appears to be a hellish existence of no escape -- in order to save two abducted townsfolk before the next snowfall destroys them all.

title: The Network
description: A sadistic killer stalks and murders young high school students through a social networking website known as MyFriends.

title: Dead Eye
description: Some secrets are best left unknown.

title: Purple Mirror
description: Sayako mysteriously wakes up in another world. As she encounters strangers who all arrived here, one by one they succumb to the Curse of the Purple Mirror. If they don't free themselves of the curse, they will all surely die. What is it they all have in common? Time is running out.

title: Welcome to Camp Swaggerville!
description: See what happens when a Saskatchewan Roughriders' fan stumbles into Chad Baker's woods.

title: Last Night Forever
description: A group of kids have a lock-in in there school. They don't realize that its a trap. One by one they are killed by one of their friends.

title: A Man in the World
description: Evil, good, and all that is in between is pushed and pulled in the winds of space and time. In this crazy and chaotic universe, evil may sometimes find its way to your doorstep for absolutely no reason at all. What do you do then?

title: Frivolity
description: Henry, an architecture professor commissioned to do a big money renovation on a house steeped in local legend, finds romance on-site with Maggie, a young ghost hunter working on her thesis. But something from long ago still lurks in the shifting shadows and crumbling corners of the old Duskridge house; something evil.

title: Vengeance Douloureuse 1: la colère est née
description: A man, whose family was killed in a radioactive accident, decides to take revenge on who caused this accident.

title: Mangrove Slasher 2
description: Lurking in the mangroves just beyond the swamps at the edge of the coast, lives a shadowy figure hellbent on ruining everyone's good time. His method - A machete. His reasons - We may never know. Mangrove Slasher Pt. 2 is the story of a wild, partying group of friends and the man who is determined to finish them off one by one. Shot entirely in the Sarasota area by director Sean Haitz, Mangrove Slasher Pt. 2 is a tour DE force of absurd-ism, a comedy that exploits horror and B-movie cliche's to maximum effect.

title: Vampire Strawberry
description: "Vampire" has been confined in a coffin at an abandoned building by a witch doctor. Two children playing in the area accidentally release him and he is free to roam the world again. He starts to possess two criminals and they acquire a thirst for the blood of girls. The whole local police station has been assigned to this bizarre case.

title: Senior Cut Day: The Movie
description: The government takes homeless people out of a small town and throws them out into the woods. After years of the homeless living in the woods, they become deadly scavengers. One day, a group of kids decides to cut school and end up breaking down in the same woods as the homeless people. The seniors must fight to survive and make it through the night.

title: The Last Summer
description: College graduates go on a survival hiking trip and try to live through it.

title: Directory Studios Presents: Insanity
description: Henry and his friends investigate a paranormally active house on the top of black hill. While there, they discover the true meaning of fear in the form of Robert Alberta and the devil.

title: Moonlight
description: The mayor of a haunted town is framed for the supicious death of a military guard. When more deaths of military guards occur, rumors of killing vampires spread fear into the town, pushing a young Taoist priest and autipist to investigate.

title: Let It Out
description: A young couple purchase their first home and discover that the house is not what it seems.

title: Rotten Luck
description: A man takes a job as a night watchman at a cemetery so he can afford to buy the girl of his dreams a bouquet of flowers, but when he comes across an ancient spell book and accidentally awakens a horde of zombies, things go awry.

title: Snickers: Don't Stop
description: The Joker appears to a group of friends during a card game. The hunger is to blame.

title: Blood City Massacre
description: Serial killer Peter Crady breaks out of prison psychiatry. Two years ago he killed his parents because they locked him into the basement and tortured him. Now he has only one thought: revenge to the people who brought him into prison, especially his sister Susan and Detective Johnson. Johnson and his partner Agent Caroline Stone are trying to arrest Crady but he plays a dangerous game with them and also with a cynical reporter team who hopes to get their big chance while interviewing Crady. 'Mad Dog' Crady like the press now calls him kidnaps Agent Stone and his sister Susan. Johnson tries to save them but only finds more victims. He helps Stone to escape and they find themselves into a bloody showdown with Crady.

title: Zombie Pickles from Space
description: From the farthest reaches of the universe, travels a burning asteroid. It crashes onto Ma's farm and infects her compost heap. While visiting Ma, Pickleman encounters the three Zombie Pickles. What will happen to our courageous hero? Will he survive the attack of these crazed and decaying cucumbers? Watch and witness the final outcome.

title: A Way Out
description: The government has quarantined a small town where either a disease similar to rabies has appeared in the local human population or where (what seems impossible) the dead are beginning to come back to life and attack the living. Having missed most of the evacuation while barricaded inside of an old house, Ben, his younger sister Erin, and their friends remain trapped within the quarantine zone. Hell bent on getting his sister to safety at all costs, Ben must lead the group across a ravaged city filled with flesh craving zombies in search of a working radio to contact the military and ensure them a ride on the last evacuation helicopter out of the quarantine zone. But with pre-existing personal tensions in the group and an entire city of zombies driven by hunger to find and kill anyone they come across, the odds are stacked against them.

title: Cow Tippers from Outer Space
description: When a planet of cows find their Chosen One was placed on earth a hundred years ago they seek to reclaim him. As the cows go to earth they realize what earthlings do to cows and treat them the same. A group of misfits are the only hope.

title: Maniac
description: Two couples goes missing.

title: Road Hell
description: When a horrific accident forces a deeply dysfunctional couple to check into a decrepit motel, a lecherous and deranged desk clerk arranges for them to witness three unholy visions of the macabre. But when cautionary tales of bloodlust, deadly creatures and a world filled with the undead don't faze these two narcissists, stronger measures are right at hand.

title: Stitching it Together: The Making of 'Needle'
originalTitle: Stitching it Together: The Making of Needle

title: 12 Counts of Deception
description: People around the world fear the number 666 and squirm in their chairs at the mere mention of it. The number is known to be the devil's number or the mark of the beast but there is a secret code that is not yet known.

title: This Body Is Wrong for Us
Ligeia
description: A man remarries after his beloved Ligea dies. However, the shadow of her presence might be more concrete than his opium dreams.

title: Panata
description: "Panata" is a pledge to God from Man, it's a way of expressing your faith.

title: Vengeance
description: In the Old West a man awakes bound to a tree in the wilderness and inches from death. He's visited by the angel of death who informs him that divine chance is in his favor and he'll be granted three wishes. As his wishes come true though, we realize this man is not who he seems to be.

title: Hooknasty
description: Christine Levitt goes to extreme lengths to become famous, to the dismay of her friend...Billie Cooper.

title: The Classic Sci-Fi Ultimate Collection: Volume 2
description: Five classic science fiction movies on this direct to DVD set.

title: PUTA: People for the Upstanding Treatment of Animals
description: Suze McDonald is a lesbian vegan, which represents the group of animal protection group PUTA. In addition, she is a witch that all those occupied by an evil spell, who refuse to stop eating meat.

title: The Campsite Killers
description: Camping, beers on the lake, one pissed off goth chick - and death.

title: Ambiguous Figure
description: A story about a little girl and what can only be described as an overactive imagination. Or is it?

title: Iron Curtain
description: Anthony, a mute, starts experiencing the supernatural. Trapped in his own silent world, he is helplessly toyed with and haunted by unexplainable entities.

title: Frankenstein vs. Hitler
description: Frankenstein goes back to ww2 and fights hitler.

title: The Last Vial
description: Hank and Maddie struggle to hide their identities as 'zombies' after humans believe they have eradicated the infected from the face of the Earth. However, they have run out of the serum that maintains their human-like appearance and Hank must go in search of more as government agents seek to unveil his true identity.

title: Final Destination 5: Visual Effects of Death - Collapsing Bridge
description: A behind the scenes split-screen look at the making of the collapsing bridge scene in Final Destination 5 including green screen footage.

title: Infliction
description: During a zombie apocalypse, love will make one man go to murderous lengths to keep his undead girlfriend alive.

title: Pixel
description: Do women drive you crazy..or maybe you drive yourself crazy about women? Tonight Pixel finds himself the wrong woman.

title: Hollywood Scream Queens II
description: The second installment of amateur home movies, of Hollywood scream queens and aspiring horror starlets.

title: The Last Nightmare
description: The Last Nightmare is a refreshingly original feel-good fantasy/horror with elements of comedy and drama. Our movie involves a mysterious presence that is linked to karma and how it is dealt back to some of the worst and most scrupulous people in our society who have all impacted the life of the main character, Clark Nelson, through tragic events. These evil individuals include a serial killer, a ruthless corporate executive, a deadly drunk driver and Clark's cheating wife, Diana along with her lover, Tony. They will all get what's coming to them by nightmarish creatures summoned to their last nightmare.

title: Toshiryô densetsu Yûko
description: In a closed school, a dozen men and women, former classmates, meet. After graduating from it, they now have to go through a university or work. Their Master Motohashi, has committed suicide. They have come to the school to investigate.

title: Woodcote: Evidence of a Haunting
description: A local news team investigate a notorious haunted house.

title: Faces of God
description: Moa-Clara meets God.

title: Blood on My Hands
description: A new girl named Lyla comes to a new town and all the guys immediately fall for her, competing to see who can take her to the homecoming dance. Whenever the date she accepts dies, an investigator is brought in to solve the matter of who is the killer and why.

title: What Lurks Inside
description: The documentation of two young lovers who move into a new home. After a series of strange and unexplained occurrences, the young couple begin to believe they are not alone.

title: To the Dirt
description: A man discovers the body of a fifteen-year-old girl washed up in a nearby creek. The young girl is twisted in river debris, donning a wedding dress and fifteen stab wounds in her chest. Unaffected by the site of the tragedy, the man takes to the corpse like a new friend. He sparks a relationship with the young rotting bride. Throughout the course of the macabre relationship, the man realizes that a cold river is no place for a friend to decay. He takes it upon himself to remedy the situation.

title: This Changed Earth
description: Blending genres and employing a unique anthology structure This Changed Earth comprises several stories themed with obsession & transgression. A man imprisoned by his own vices. The search for a cursed movie. Drug induced hallucinations...

title: Hormonal Activity
description: Micah and his friends try to prove that Katie turns 'evil' once a month in this supernatural battle of the sexes spoofing 'Paranormal Activity,' 'The Ring,' 'The Grudge' and 'The Exorcist.'

title: The Wretched Auteur's 81, 000 Frames
description: This is a dark comedy about a solo film maker trying to figure out how he will complete a film he started with no help or resources. As he reaches his own conclusion of how he can accomplish his vision he finds himself going against everything he believes in spiritually. When he told a potential client he had zero money, one camera and no crew, he thought they told him to go mock himself!

title: Bad Girl
description: A mysterious little girl lures people deep in the forest to their doom.

title: Walter
description: Two brothers video tape their rampage over a week's period.

title: Haunted Red
description: This film is about a man obsessed with his wife's red hair.

title: Intrusion
description: Five years ago, Ashley Donigan moved across the country after her fiance took a new job. Days later, her body was found in her new home. Years after being declared a cold case, officials received chilling new evidence to reopen the investigation: actual video of Ashley's final days alive. Some of the video Ashely shot herself, and some she had no idea was ever recorded.

title: It Followed Me Too
description: All she wants is an answer.

title: The Children of Dead Roses
description: How has Rosetta De Luca convinced these five girls into a state of insanity? The sensationalist reporter Mark Faust wants to know. An experimental film of one surviving girl, who's mind remained intact despite a series of gruesome tests against the human mentality.

title: Contagion: The Macabre World of the Zombie Hunter
description: Peter Palma, the History Channel's former star competitor of 'Top Shot,' speaks in this documentary on the topic of zombie hunters, as the sleepy Amish town of New Holland transforms for just one day into a zombie-themed mega-shoot.

title: Un-scene
description: A soulful photographer investigates a mysterious murder scene through the lens of his camera, revealing echoes of the crime.

title: My Super Ex-Grudge
description: After a specter with a heart of gold is dumped by a womanizing necrophiliac, she unleashes her grudge in the form of emotional pranks and good, old fashioned unpleasantness.

title: The Clown
description: A teenage girl alone in a house....turns out shes not alone. Where the Clown goes, blood follows.

title: Man Alive!
description: Detectives on a case involving a string of murders which seem to be carried out by victims of previous murders. 2 girls attempt to have a girl's night by ordering a man off of Craigslist.

title: Terror of the Killer Carnivorous Coat
description: A group of friends struggle for survival as they are faced with the ancient, demonic evil of - the killer carnivorous coat.

title: Hilltop Cemetery
description: When grandfather Billie died, the only thing left to his grandsons, Josh and Conner, was the responsibility of taking care of Hilltop Cemetery for a few days. Could this be a few days of fun or ...

title: Angel of Shavano
description: High in the Rocky Mountains, a young man takes a relic from a Colorado gold mine, awakening the spirit of a Native American princess. Haunted by nightmares and the murder of his mother, young Micah struggles to survive while being hunted by an unrelenting ghost, the Angel of Shavano, who seeks the return of her stolen treasure. 22 years later, Micah has found temporary refuge at a church in Montana, but he is soon forced to return to Colorado, where he must confront his past, his conscience, and an angry ghost who will stop at nothing to protect the treasure of her people for eternity.

title: Ekho
description: A psychological horror/thriller short film experiment in narrative and visual deception that challenges traditional film construction by exploring both internal and external points of view. The audience interprets on-screen events through juxtaposition of images whilst presented with a deconstructed narrative.

title: I Really Don't Want to Hear it! Horror Stories from the Mountains
description: Another hit series from the "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" team. This film includes 8 videos.

title: A Horror Sci-Fi Picture
description:
The first attempts to create something different and creative projects that helped the team to make others video-productions in Youtube Channel.

Great example: Director's Cut of A HORROR SCI-FI PICTURE (2013)

A Horror Sci-Fi Picture (2011) is also one of the first video short of Alien Pictures Studio together with Road Movie (2011)

title: Production Hell
description: This film is a documentary based on three location scouts, who in the summer of 2010 went missing while on location.

title: X Marks the Spot
description: Abigail is obsessed with her Friend Tracker application. She checks in every time she stops somewhere. Her roommate Chloe thinks it's too much disclosure and Abigail is putting herself at risk for a stalker. What neither of them know is that Patrick has been watching and waiting and now he's ready to get what he wants and he's going to know right where to find it.

title: Zompyre Rising
description: Set in the post-Apocalyptic Southwest seven years after the outbreak of a deadly and unstoppable virus, Zompyre Rising tells the dramatic and action-packed story of a small band of survivors who face relentlessly insurmountable odds. As their numbers dwindle and infighting threatens to tear the survivors apart, new hope is found that may be the very key to mankind's survival. But as they soon discover, they are not alone; they are being watched, and the virus might not be the biggest threat to their survival after all.

title: Bandaged
description: One young Japanese couple hurting each other in the night. This is their way to feel connected and they are satisfied with it. But one day their life is about to change.

title: Outliving Dracula: Le Fanu's Carmilla
description: Outliving Dracula explores the radical influence of the classic (and first) lesbian vampire story, JS Le Fanu's Carmilla, on generations of filmmakers - from Carl Dreyer's extraordinary Vampyr to Roger Vadim's Blood and Roses, from the Gothic kitsch of Hammer through to films produced for an art gallery context. Featuring interviews with leading film scholars and visual artists influenced by Le Fanu, Outliving Dracula seeks to redefine Le Fanu's critical importance as an Irish writer whose ghostly traces remain profound and enigmatic. This documentary suggests that Carmilla may perhaps be more radical and transgressive today as a creative wellspring than its successor Dracula.

title: The Poorhouse Revisited
description: In the time of Ireland's Great Famine, an elderly gravedigger revisits a traumatic event through the decaying visions of his fragmented dreams.

title: Bloodstone II
description: Derrick McGregor returns to slay the ultimate master vampire Quintana with the help of long-time friends Joe Lassader and Dr. Xavier Burns.

title: Hate
description: Eight stories of malice and mayhem, death and dismemberment, jealousy and revenge.

title: Ghosts of Old Shanghai
description: Ghosts of Old Shanghai is a Horror/Thriller film with elements of Chinese mythology, history, comedy, and martial arts. Set against the compelling backdrop of modern Shanghai, it's an entertaining and chilling horror experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Mark and Jessica move into an old Shanghai 'lane house' from the 1930s, and strange things start to happen. Mark finds odd symbols, and has disturbing experiences that lead him to believe he is haunted by shadows of Shanghai's violent past. Mark meets a handsome Chinese tour guide, a fascinating English neighbor, an absurd self-help guru, and an eccentric German historian. But who are his real friends? His descent into darkness leads to a deadly confrontation with an ancient evil.

title: Kuru
description: Following a personal tragedy, Claire and Ethan take a break in their relationship. While sorting through some belongings, Claire discovers a mysterious item which she soon regrets, as her once idyllic existence transforms into a waking nightmare.

title: Unnecessary Fear
description: As a woman walks home from her boyfriend's house she is terrified by the film she has just finished watching about a stalker who mutilates his victims. She accidentally drops her keys and a man attempts to return them to her. The man reminds her of the stalker in the film and the events that ensue begin to mirror that of the film.

title: Lights Out
description: Suspicious activities have been going on at a local private school. A few students have gone missing. Two boys decide to take up a challenge to stay overnight at the school. The boys have experiences that jeopardize their lives.

title: Tickers
description: A mother's sacrifice, the ultimate sacrifice. Only the watchmaker can save her son, but the price must be paid. There is just one key to every heart.

title: Abnormal Activity
description: A tale of two men haunted by a demonic spirit -the spirit determined to kill.

title: The Trip Out
description: A day out at the lake takes a turn for the worst when a group of friends come across an old burial site.

title: Microcinema
description: Peter Martell is a highly educated well-to-do young man with a lot of free time on his hands. He spends this time watching snuff films. One day he makes the bold decision to cross the line from observer to participant, aspiring to bring a philosophical element to his own kind of snuff films. Ready to go to work, he tracks his first victim into a haunted New England woods, where the line between participant and observer takes a different turn.

title: Suicide Preachers
description: A small seaside town is invaded by aliens with the ability to make people kill themselves.

title: Un Hombre Está Tumbado En El Suelo
description: A man is digging a hole with his own hands on the ground. There, he finds a bottle. This leads us to a room where he and his girlfriend discuss about their relationship.

title: Inside the Clock of the White Rabbit
Deep Space
description: Three engineers go on a mission to repair the communication grid array in sector six.

title: The Life Cycle of a Good Idea
description: Creative people! This is your life story in 60 seconds.

title: Exit 91 Summerland
description: EXIT 91 SUMMERLAND is a low budget love story/ ghost story, about a fun loving your couple starring fresh faced- Megan Dewitt and Curtis( Josh Pomer) . The story begins with the couple who want to get away from the town that they live in Wyoming and experience something that they have never seen before. They land on a town called Summerland California, and proceed to make their way there in Curtis's 1970 Black Lincoln Continental Coupe. They then move in and start to discover that they have essentially moved into a apartment that has dark secrets and they slowly become possessed by the spirits of Summerland.

title: Mad in Italy
description: A young woman in the hands of a maniac fights to stay alive.

title: Last Laugh
description: At dinner time, Samantha has a heated argument with her mother. After the argument her mother sends her to her room for the night. Feeling guilty about the argument, Samantha decides to sleep it off. As she tries to sleep, she begins to hear and see things. Then soon she encounters a demonic clown who calls himself Heckler, who has dark plans for her.

title: Dominion: The Web Series
description: A detective is hired to find a missing woman, but his new client is hiding more than she is telling and the detective soon finds himself being sucked in to the world of the supernatural.

title: Melinda
description: Melinda returns home to find herself greeted by unexpected company.

title: The Shepherd
description: A school girl is drawn into a cult via a strange new friend on the Internet.

title: Foreclosure
description: An ambitious real-estate investor quits the urban landscape that made him rich, escaping to one of his remote properties purchased on a foreclosure. But running from the temptations and ghosts that haunt him back in Los Angeles lead him to demons in the northern woods which prove far more damning than anything he ever faced in the big city.

title: Light Rail
description: While traveling on a light rail train, a girl notices a man stalking a woman and begins to stalk him.

title: Breaths: Respiri nel buio
description: On 12th October 2010, three young University researchers started to shoot a documentary about the Orfanotrofio delle Grazie, an orphanage closed 25 years earlier because of an arson which caused the dead of 10 children, the director of the institute and his assistant. On October 15th, three days later, the Police came to the abandoned orphanage, alerted by the teacher who coordinated the work of the three researchers. A rescuer discovered unearthed in the boiler room, hidden under a table, the camera used by the three guys. The dramatic images recorded in the videocassette provide documentary evidence of the last hours spent by the three guys in that damned place.

title: Zodiac
description: In 1969 San Francisco, a mysterious serial killer started murdering innocents, and send disturbing letter to local newspaper.

title: To Haunt You
description: Strange things start to happen to Jill when she breaks up with her boyfriend of the past few months. The phone keeps ringing but there's no one there, she sees strange messages on her TV screen, and a strange teenage girl is hanging around her home. Is it all a campaign of harassment by her ex boyfriend--or is it something more? 'To Haunt You' is the first feature from Indianapolis, IN based Liberty or Death Productions.

title: Shifter
description: Eight friends on a weekend getaway are interrupted by two fighting vampires.

title: Screamer
description: Two broke underdogs attempt to make a successful haunted house attraction in Indiana. This gun and run film follows Matt Kemp and Phil Granger for four years while they attempt to make it, often with less than desirable but humorous results.

title: Fear North
description: An evil land developer from America has decided to divert her stream through Tapu (sacred) land. Despite local protest, the diversion begins, releasing bones and a Curse into the water supply. A group of students from the local Area School discover that the tainted water is turning people into Zombies. With super-natural assistance the students form a plan to rid the water of the Curse, before it is too late!

title: Twilight Theatre
description: Sampler from the full length theatrical show Twilight Theatre, a rock opera/paranormal,horror.sci fi,supernatural dance theatre multimedia show about the chronological timeline of the history of the paranormal/supernatural from stonehenge all the way up to modern day ufo sightings and political genocide. It also makes a statement about how pop culture changes so rapidly that it consumes itself and its very creators, in this case the twilight theatre monsters go after their creators who have abandoned them(major label record companies once supporting mainstream rock and hard rock and once innovative fm radio stations that once played and supported this musical genre ). Well you cant kill rock and roll and here come the monsters of twilight theatre to prove it and go after their creators,(once innovative major label record companies and fm rock radio stations) like the frankenstein monster feeling spurned and abandoned.

title: Torn
description: For his 21st birthday party Derrek and some friends escape for the weekend to an isolated cabin in the middle of the woods. Derrek's brother, Ethan gatecrashes the party and after a malevolent prank goes wrong resulting in the death of Derrek's girlfriend. Reactions vary from calling the police to disposing of the body, sides are taken and they question what they would do to survive.

title: The Lost Realities of Hog Caller
description: Award-winning reporter Skip Jenkins from Community News takes a journey into the Three Mile Island afflicted lands of Middletown, PA searching for the hard to find grindcore band Hog Caller. The resulting docu/mockumentary, interspersed with Hog Caller's nightmarish realities, contaminated music videos and toxic lyrics, candidly follows a reporter, a cast of locals and an elusive band towards crisis, confusion, and more questions than answers. Featuring repugnant footage of swine desecration, alcohol abuse, weed worship, satanism, and the grotesque birth of an inter-species pig/human hybrid.

title: Alien Vengeance: The Other Me
description: A woman accused of killing a policeman has no memory of the event, but her reflection does. Sarah is sure that she is not the type of person to hurt anyone, but the Federal agents who have planted cameras in her house aren't sure that she's a person at all. Not anymore. Now Sarah is left arguing with her mirror reflection and trying to figure out just who is control of her body, life and destiny.

title: Detrás del horror
description: A group of friends head out into the woods to shoot a horror film but something goes horribly wrong.

title: Ventman
description: Cryptozoologist Prof. Hans Rudi investigative a series bizarre occurrences.

title: Raven's Nightmare
description: An emotionally disturbed young Texas lassie, Raven Pyncheon, flees from crazed watermelon farmers across a swampy landscape as demons descend on a dark storm-tossed evening of evil.

title: Emerald Lagoon
description: When micro scientist Dr. Connors and his assistant, Libby Myers, are discovered missing from the small Everglades community of Emerald Lagoon, Libby's father becomes concerned and tries to find Roland, a local fishing guide, to search for her.

title: Poconggg Juga Pocong
description: The view of the world in a funny way from the eyes of a ghost called "Poconggg".

title: Sommermärchen
description: A male hooker is drawn deeper and deeper into desperation. In his attempts to get out of his misery, he begins a journey through the city. He escapes to the countryside and slowly falls into love. But this is only the beginning.

title: Beyond the Walls
description: In this house dark secrets hide within the walls. All who live here are haunted by what was once here. No one is safe, not even in their dreams. Each new resident is driven crazy until they too become part of the house, trapped forever. This low budget film contains multiple short stories that all take place at this one unassuming house. Each story connects to each other. There is an old woman who receives devastating news only to get trapped in this house in a shocking way. Then a man is driven crazy by the animals that lurk in the backyard. He believes they are plotting to kill him. He lives in constant fear with no way of escaping the horror. Finally a woman moves into this house only be haunted by the trapped spirits who live there. Not only do they terrorize her each day they also haunt her dreams. Move in if you must, but don't expect to ever move out. This house won't let you.

title: The Building
description: Something is wrong with that building.

title: The Scream of the Screaming Screamer!
description: A woman, trapped in a recurring nightmare involving an inflatable painting, vows to get a good night's rest -- by any means necessary.

title: Sightings
description: Three students shooting a story about an abandoned army base for a school school project disappear. Lost video footage is found of three students shooting a school project which shows their final minutes.

title: Exit 101
description: 7 friends uncover a long forgotten deadly military experiment in the small rural town of Lakeshear.

title: Troubled Tommy's Tales of Woe
description: Troubled Tommy hates his baby brother, who gets away with everything! Tommy's scheme to get revenge at the dinner table might not go the way he planned, though.

title: Trail of Blood
description: A journey of the psyche, in which a schizophrenic man, Crane, attempts to escape a horrible secret that haunts him relentlessly.

title: Wraith Island
description: Six teenagers go on an outing to an island for a cheap get away only to discover its haunted with an evil pirate past.

title: Among the Fallen
description: Among the Fallen delves into the unexplored inner workings of the human mind, by balancing both the physical and mental horrors that a person experiences when dealt a horrible loss of a loved one, and combines that with the gruesome visual decadence of a zombie film. Combining the reflective aesthetics of art-house cinema with the gory and primitive nature of zombie films, Among the Fallen brings about an original story of a grieving writer struggling to come to terms with his past as he battles his inner and outer demons. Gathering inspiration from such filmmakers as Dario Argento, Lucio Fulci, and George Romero, the film combines a plethora of unconventional themes to create an unorthodox and surreal zombie story. One with a human soul.

title: Hollywood Scream Queens III
description: The third installment of amateur home movies, of Hollywood scream queens and aspiring horror starlets.

title: Monster Fights
description: Monster Fights plays off the idea if Dracula and the Frankenstein monster met when Dracula was on his way to America from Transylvania. The Frankenstein monster then becomes a minion of Dracula by the end because he cannot overtake him.

title: The Haunted Files
description: Sandra has a beautiful house, a handsome fiance, and life is good. Why then, is she so troubled?

title: The Curse
description: Found footage video with a satirical look at 1950's sexual education for women.

title: The 12 Day Smile
description: Martin Williams is housed in a mental institution after being accused of murdering his family. Psychiatrist Cynthia Ganz is summoned to the hospital to probe Martin to get him to recall the horrible events, with disastrous results.

title: Abduction
description: A paranoid alien conspiracy theorist exposes the events surrounding his abduction.

title: Client 14
description: A slew of beautiful escorts are brutally murdered by an unseen knife wielding killer. The events soon traumatize a Private Investigator as he is unable to protect the escorts he befriends.

title: Still Missing
description: Anna has been trying to find her missing twin sister Venessa for a year, but she has vanished without trace. When Anna bumps into Phil, whom she knows from an old photography class, her investigation takes an unexpected turn.

title: Apostate
description: The perfect couple must face an awful truth delivered by a determined stranger.

title: Benvenuti a Fuocofatuo
description:
Francesco Pasanisi sta guardando la televisione. Dopo aver fatto zapping, fra canali politicisti, cose trash e spot inadatti all'ora di pranzo, capita su un canale in cui sta iniziando un film, "Benvenuti a Fuocofatuo". Da qui in poi vedremo anche noi il "programma".A Fuocofatuo, un paesino di montagna del Sud Italia, i morti escono dalle loro tombe per divorare i vivi e diffondere il contagio dei morti viventi fra gli abitanti, ma non è tutto lineare come una "normale" vicenda di zombi....

Gli autori Francesco Pasanisi ed Edoardo Trevisani appaiono in due piccole scene comiche nei panni di un primario superficiale e burbero e di un medico più preciso e professionale.

title: Alicen's Diary
description: Alicen Wyatt, a struggling actress who is recording a video diary in the hopes of securing a reality TV show, is down on her luck - so best friend Jeri Smythe jokes that she should perform a ritual for money. With Alicen's sister Cameron's help, they do so; but after a brief prosperity, an evil entity attacks, demanding payment - with someone's life.

title: Excuse the Sin
description: Journey of a man living in the sins of his mind.

title: Dracula: The Vampire and the Voivode
description: The legends of Dracula are untangled through interviews and visits to locations associated with him.

title: Gist
description: Amon tries to fill out the emptiness in his heart with violence against former band members and their relatives regarding the shock he had suffered from watching the girl, he is in love with kissing the lead singer of the band.

title: Fantastic Tales Of The Unknown: The Movie
description: On the day of Halloween, two fan boys reminisce their favorite episodes of a supernatural 80's TV show that has long been canceled.

title: The Infernal Room
description: In an old house, behind a marked door, lies an Evil waiting to cross the gateway of hell into our world and escape The Infernal Room.

title: Utburd
description: Inspired by Scandinavian folklore, 'Utburd' tells the tale of a young woman named Alice who must face her inner demons after giving birth to an unwanted child. Set in a time when women's rights were few, Alice makes a choice... and is haunted by the consequences.

title: 2 Channel no Noroi - VOL. 5
description: Fifth volume in the 2 Channel series.

title: A Nervous Tick
description: A tick, a doll, duplicity and twisted minds, all unfurl in this surreal psycho thriller.

title: The Shadows of Ants
description: Four supernatural tragedies. Drama and horror collide during the course of a day and night in the lives of ten people.

title: Grafarvogur 5
description: Spirits inhabiting an old house attempt to posses the new tenants.

title: Abram's Hand
description: Seven friends fight to escape a violent death and struggle with the knowledge that their death's might be punishment from the hand of God.

title: Fields of the Damned
description: Three zombie-apocalypse survivors Cage, Grit, and Tank must go on a zombie slaying adventure across America to try to deliver an antidote to stop the zombie virus and save the human race.

title: The Devil's Interval
description: Late one night a Priest picks up a mysterious hitchhiker. On arrival in his local village the anonymous stranger disappears into the night. He has left behind a scroll of music. Intrigued by its mystery, the priest is compelled to play the music. He plays like a man possessed and upon hitting the last note a gateway is opened and the once small and quiet village is changed forever.

title: Sketchy House
description: After discovering some terrifying eight-millimeter footage from the late 1970s, and finding out the locations it was recorded at, three student filmmakers hit the roads of Southeastern North Carolina to shoot a documentary about the obscure locations, and everything they hope to find from the eight-millimeter while they're there. During the production of their documentary, weird things start to happen, leading to the disappearance of one of the filmmakers, and capturing one of the most frightening incidents ever caught on video.

title: Look Behind You
description: A girl receives a mysterious phone call from a child warning of the 'darkness' that is creeping up behind her. The little child's voice continues to warn the girl to 'look behind her' that soon it will be too late. However the girl dismisses the call as a crank.

title: The Blackness
description: Waking in a hospital bed, Jamie Stanton finds himself in excruciating pain. He cannot communicate with those around him. He quickly realizes things are not as they seem and those once trusted have become captors. His quest to find the answer to his true identity depends on an elusive little girl. Is she an image from the past or a mirage of self delusion?

title: Out Go the Lights
description: When Joe Orpheo, a young, Hollywood-endorsed auteur director disappears from the decrepit and empty house location of his big-buck feature shoot - along with his entire cast and crew - opportunistic B-Movie titan Derek LeClair declares squatter's rights and starts setting up a feature shoot of his own in the same house. But the terrible fate of Joe's cast and crew also awaits Derek and his collaborators. The slasher flick hack and the up-and-coming wunderkind bring their opposing artistic visions to bear in a final confrontation that has a third creative presence as well, one only interested in possessing souls both above and below the line.

title: The Gossip Collector
description: A woman is collecting garbage as a way to dig deeper in another's personal story. She finds a small box that belongs to a girl who is about to commit suicide, but she looks upon a matter as entertainment. Whenever the girl hesitates kill herself, the viewer shows her displeasure. After watching her try a couple of times, tired of waiting, she finally decides to take matters into her own hands.

title: Hester Prynne
description: Robert Cleaver (Brian Jagger) patiently waits for his wife, Martha, to meet him at the theater. But what Robert doesn't realize is that there is already something at the theater waiting for him.

title: Morella
description: Morella is the woman who defies death through the birth of her child. The story is told by a series of decomposing portraits.

title: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi: Dainiju-banashi
description: 22th installment in Broadway's "Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi" series.

title: The Exile
description: A film about a combat veteran's need for redemption, about saving mankind, learning to trust again, and most importantly... kicking alien ass.

title: Professor Brofman
description: Has your husband been behaving strangely lately? Has he been snarling and suffering sudden attacks of violence? Has he tried to bite you? Don't worry, call 555-2368 now, and Professor Brofman will swiftly come and solve your problem. Then maybe your husband has become a... vampire!

title: Stan & Sylvia: The Married Ghost Hunters
description: Stan Gottleib and Sylvia Della Fontinolia-Gottleib, a husband and wife team of professional ghost hunters, investigate the strange haunting of Karen.

title: Goosebumps: 'The Blob That Ate Everyone' and 'Go Eat Worms' DVD Commercial
description: A commercial for the Goosebumps DVDs 'The Blob That Ate Everyone' and 'Go Eat Worms'.

title: Paradise
description: In the chaos in the Aftermath of the Civil War an "outbreak" occurs. This is that story.

title: Shechita (Shuh-key-tuh)
description: Grandfather is a retired kosher butcher (shoychet). But when his granddaughter Dvorah picks up the razor sharp ritual knife (chalaf), things go very wrong.

title: Cwazy Wabbit 2
description: A toy rabbit talks about his best friend.

title: Girl in Basement
description: Boy having fun in the basement, but hes not alone.

title: Date Night
description: A boy, a girl, and a Polaroid.

title: Ever Been in Love?
description: A neo-noir about the crazy things that love can make people do.

title: Curse
description: 5 young people uncover an ancient curse and pay the ultimate price.

title: The Black Box
description: Audrey lives in an era simply referred to as 'The Shut-In Period.' Basically meaning that after nightfall one best keep their ass shut behind closed doors. The world has ended and no one is exactly sure why. Most have either died or gone mad. The few who remain fight and kill for survival in a world dominated by the Internet. In a move to stem rising violence, everyone has been implanted with a chip that records every second of every day. The device referred to as 'The Black Box' does its job well. Too well. Memories, thoughts, and emotions live on...even after death.

title: The Curable
description: The Curable is an 80min Psychological Thrill-Ride through the molecules of scientific terror. A paranoid, pharmaceutically challenged man awakes one day to find himself inside a run-down, scientific research facility. The professors inhabiting the place believe the man to be 'contaminated' and take extreme measures to 'cure' him. Written, produced, directed, shot, edited & scored by one person, this ultra low-budget, grind-house affair aims to annihilate your senses, make your flesh crawl and leave your brain decimated.

title: Caffe dei Libri
description: After his night shift a barman can't get out of the coffee shop where he works. His girlfriend is anxiously waiting to meet with him in another part of the town. While he is trying to get out, he finds out that mysterious entities live there after closing time, and some of them can be violent. Reality becomes a nightmare even more when the girlfriend shows up. Her life is at risk too. They are going to learn, during the creepy and surreal night, that the only way out to survive will be facing their own fears.

title: Tsukiyo
description: On one crazy night, a marriage Proposal, a Serial Killer and Evil Alien Bugs come together to bring chaos into the life of Amanda.

title: Rantdog's Top Ten Zombies - Ever!
description: A heavily armed Rantdog rants about why Zombies are cool and why Twitch should just shut-up and listen. Twitch is gaged and tied to a post. Next to Twitch, a pile of rotting zombies, and a freshly dug grave. Its marked by a headstone carved 'RIP Twitch'. Twitch struggles to untie his bonds as Zombies attack. Rantdog defending his buddy from the brain-cravers, as he blasts the undead as he professes his love for the undead. Will Twitch learn to love Zombies? Does Rantdog love Zombies too much? Does Rantdog love slow Zombies or slow Zombies?

title: Thank You, Jesus!
description: What begins as a tender, romantic walk in the park, degenerates into bloodshed and mayhem upon the chance meeting of a very naughty squirrel. Hilarity ensues when the squirrel's arch-nemesis, a homeless man, becomes involved in the lover's tiff.

title: Chip and Bernie's Dating Guide for the Zombie Apocalypse
description: The world's greatest Zombie exterminator's Chip and Bernie have made their newest edition to the survival guide tips. 'Chip and Bernie's Dating Guide for the Zombie Apocalypse.' Learn where to meet a woman and what to bring her for the first date. Also learn what to do once you start to drift apart. Chip and Bernie teach you all you need to know to find a zomatch and find out the problems with Zombie's want love too.

title: Hi There Horror Movie Fans
description: "Hi There Horror Movie Fans" was a biographical documentary on the horror host Bill Bowman and his character "The Bowman Body".

title: Faded Sight
description: A message about drinking and driver effects.

title: Satan's Blood Army Unleashed
description: Two Supernatural hunters battle it out with a gathering of Vampires bent on the destruction of the world.

title: Red Balloon
description: A woman deals with the loss of the girl she was taking care of.

title: Not Found 3
description: 3rd entry in the Japanese horror found footage series "Not Found".

title: Fight or Flight
description: A young man (Keith Withers) says some things that have become unpopular, and is chased to within an inch of his life.

title: Here and There
description: Newlyweds Mark & Tara Collins have recently moved into a rancher in the suburbs in an attempt to get away from the hustle and bustle of the big city. The house was practically a steal since the previous owners had abandoned it. Though they are still satisfied with their short sale purchase something seems off and not just Tara's biological clock.

title: Creed
description: In the midst of his own investigation in pursuit of his wife's killer, Jon encounters supernatural elements that make him realize he is in over his head.

title: Eins og við værum
description: Following the economic crash in Icelandic an artist and his model find themselves in a sinking city. They move into a beautiful studio and decide to paint one portrait a day during their time there. But as the paintings pile up, the city turns into cold and unfriendly place. The two men are lonely and isolated as they deal with an existence of endless repetition without an end in sight. An experimental documentary on Icelandic artist Ragnar Kjartansson and his piece The End at the 53rd Venice Biennale in 2009. Ragnar did a 6 month long performance there where he portrayed the artist working in his studio, painting one portrait a day of a beautiful young male model.

title: Garrett
description: A morbidly amusing story told in rhyme. Garrett is a boy who finds life tedious, and resolves to end it all. However, to his chagrin, he proves to be indestructible.

title: The Grudge
description: The Grudge, who "hates everyone and everything," finds himself host to a party thrown by his friends. A conversation with his best friend takes an unexpected turn that changes the Grudge's view of the party and possibly himself.

title: Honto Ni Atta!! Riaru Toshi Densetsu
description: First entry in a physic documentary that visualizes horror experiences submitted from all over Japan. This film includes 6 of those experiences.

title: Well of the Beast
description: Shot entirely on VHS and toy cameras, 'Well of the Beast' tells how three radical poets travel to an un-named South American town for a cheap eye surgery. Having declared poetic war on society, the three friends soon experience strange happenings as the newly replaced eyes of our hero, Anton, begin to suggest hidden and sinister agendas amongst his companions. Literary and filmic references run rampant in this campy, low-fi, art-house feature that blends genres and styles into a madhouse romp through all things poetic.

title: Living with Lovecraft
description: Many have lived with Lovecraft on their shelves for decades, his fantastic creations tucked safely between the covers of his books. Today...they're moving in.

title: Piano for Three Hands
description: Maria's brilliant career as a concert pianist is cut short, when she loses her right hand. Her husband, obsessed with her music, is driven to take frightening measures to restore her ability to play.

title: El espanto
description: Alvaro Torres is a normal guy that unexpectedly beset by terrible nightmares and hallucinations, with appalling creatures that will take him to the limit of the madness. He will have to fight, so as not to lose his mind, against something horrible that could be more real than it seems.

title: Sanzu: Sun of the Dead
description: Four people and a dead girl stand in a room of a building. They were chased by someone and gathered here by chance.

title: Fang
description: Three friends break into their neighbors' house to investigate their suspicious behavior. They unknowingly unleash a horror upon their town that none of them could have ever imagined or prepared for.

title: Honto ni atta! Noroi no bideo 45
A Tell Tale Haunting
description: Jimmy deacon, a lonely rancher accidentally kills his neighbor rummaging in his barn thinking him a thief. Jimmy then decides to hide the killing by burying his neighbor in the back of the barn under the dirt floor. As the neighbors and police come asking questions, Jimmy begins to hear a heartbeat that pounds in his head when he lies about his wrong doing. The ghost of his neighbor confronts him and ultimately drives him to admit his murderous deed.

title: Slasher
description: A slasher film is gloriously obvious, but therein lies the possibility for play. Using the violence of the cut and splicing a narrative out of darkness, the unseen of the movie both harbors and executes murder.

title: Cremation of an Ideology
description: A man relentlessly drifts through a house and experiences many sudden realization of visions.

title: Playing Dead: A Documentary About the Zombie Subculture
description: Playing Dead explores the role of the living dead within our culture today. From the 'Thriller' dance to the apocalypse, zombies have infiltrated all aspects of our society.

title: Metazombie
description: Roxanne Dodge works in a government office but has always dreamed about making films. Zombie films. She manages to assemble what she needs to make a short zombie flick but as the project gets into production the pressures on set begin to mimic the survival story of a group of holdouts to a zombie infestation. Metazombie is about a city, Windsor, Ontario, the unemployment capital Canada, and the heart and soul of its inhabitants. It is also about how we construct our identities from our dreams, and how these dreams are sometimes better left in the realm of our imaginations.

title: The Ritual
description: A tale of a magician and his occult obsession.

title: Killer
description: 'Killer' is a stop motion and clay animation video that shows us four happy little dolls having a great time in the woods during wintertime. They surprise us with the 'gourmet' meat they're having for barbecue. Unlike many fantasies translated to the world of animation, in this piece there's no moralizing preoccupation with innocence or guilty because these characters are aggressors and victims, whose actions only further indict them. 'Killer' is a comment on our lifestyle based on consumerism and disposable lives. These characters congratulate themselves and gather around their 'prize' like ladies do when they find a bargain at a fashion shop. It is also a humorous take on the word 'man-eater'.

title: Blackpowder Hills
description: California, 1890. Young Israel Sutter seeks vengeance for his slain brother Cal. Through hell and high water, a boy seeks to become a man through bloodshed.

title: Where the Dogs Divide Her
description: Where the Dogs Divide Her begins amid the aftermath of a family massacre. A nameless man sits in an unfamiliar bathroom, his bloodied hands trembling as he ponders his crime of passion. An amnesiac without an identity, he goes in search of himself, only to unearth a long-buried family secret surrounding the bizarre deaths of his parents. An abstract ghost story populated by ever-threatening specters, shadowy souls with evil motives who inhabit a nightmare world within a troubled killer's psyche. They might offer a smile or a kind word, but their only purpose is to snare others into their Hell. Before the killer can come to terms with his deeds and escape this esoteric prison, he must confront his dead parents and make good on an infant's promise made thirty years ago.

title: Sublease
description: This bleak satire is an examination of reality television from voyeurism to exploitation. The plot centers around three reality TV show contestants, on 'Sublease' ,who are isolated from the outside world and each other within a house of twisted realities and fantasies. Selling off the furniture to a host who is both detached and seemingly malevolent, the film displays how three individuals attempt to build a community while they, themselves fall apart.

title: A Haunting at Giger State University
description: The spring semester has ended, leaving Giger State University's campus all but deserted. Music students Sarah and Patricia volunteer to work late in the music library to help the department prepare for accreditation. Both have heard rumors of the building's haunted history, but neither takes such seriously, something they soon regret as events transpire that leave them questioning their sanity and fighting for their lives.

title: How M.T. Graves Classic Began!
description: This is a short documentary on how the comic strip "M.T. Graves Classic" came into being.

title: The Attack
description: The world is pretty scary out there. It's best not to think about it. In this short, horror video two female roommates find themselves smacked in the face with some scary reality which threatens to infringe on their superficial existence. Using and subverting the classic genre of traditional zombie movie to, this low budget tale aims to consider who the real zombies are.

title: I Really Don't Want to Hear it! Horror Stories from the Mountains 2
description: Another hit series from the "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" team. This film includes 8 videos.

title: As Though Dead
description: We have pretended that it couldn't happen again but it has happen before and it will happen again. Do you believe? Is your faith strong enough? And are you close enough to him? The end is near and the rapture process has started and during this event the wrath of God will be revealed and the faith of others will be tested. Michael is a down and out sales person tired of going from job to job. He involves his friends in a plot to make a fake documentary. Jenni the local preacher's daughters let's Michael and his friends use the church late one night to film his fake documentary about a guy named Mr. Johnson seeing Jesus. A unexpected guest comes to the church and reveals something terrible is happening. It appears that people are killing each other and the first stage of the end of the world has started. They must come together in the church and take sides before each of them get taken one by one but during the rapture process the soul is pulled from the body and the soulless body attacks the closest person to them in search of a soul but the question is what one person believes is the rapture process could be something terrible. The future of our society is put in the hands of a few but they must find the faith and courage it takes to save what's left.

title: Action Figures
description: Sometime in the 21st century, a new evil threatens humankind. Meet the fundamentalist movie fan! Raised by violence in the media and armed to the teeth, these suburban thugs declare holy war against Hollywood in a string of horrific mass shootings threatening the very fabric of human civilization! A bizarre cult of militant nerds addicted to fantasy and obsessed with blockbuster movies like Star Wars and Batman begin to stalk humans as prey, treating their victims like living toys for their own sick entertainment. Can anyone stop these psychos from dragging the world into a war which to them is little more than a live game of Action Figures? In a strange new world ruled by Star Wars Fundamentalists comes the first chapter in the darkest mythology the world has ever known!

title: The Earl Sessions
description: Film about a superhero struggling with failure.

title: Paw II
description: In the second installment of the Paw series, JigPaw (Brett "SonicBlu" Blumfield - WORMWOOD; PAW) conducts a series of tests for his latest victims to overcome. It's a race against time for Consumer Fox, Scruff Jenkins, Jimmy Jacob, Jerry Marlon, Kurt Bond, and Bosco Bear to locate several clues that will slowly reveal the answers to their escape. Meanwhile in "JigPaw's" basement, Potential Fox attempts to discover that the tests he is forced to witness may very well be his own. How far will "JigPaw" go before his "lessons" are learned? It will all come together as the game begins the trials between life and death. Only the victims themselves can make that choice. Let the games begin.

title: Friends for Eternity
description: How far would you go to keep your best friend forever?

title: Release
description: After a soldier retreating from battle watches an innocent woman succumb to her wounds, he wanders the forest in a daze. While he struggles for survival against the wilderness, a strange presence begins to haunt him. His grasp on reality spirals out of control until he is forced to face the truth.

title: THE Shinrei Shashin: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi
description: Among the myriad of photographs that exist, there are some that cannot be explained in words. People who should not be there, strange patterns, deformed heads, too many limbs. Here are 46 of those photos, carefully selected.

title: Bird-Scorpion
description: Bird-Scorpion is about the struggle of Americans and how the wars and conflicts in other countries is brought to our doorstep. A thriller that takes two guys on the adventure of their lives as they discover their true hearts and fight the evil that attempts to take over their house. With the help of some unlikely friends they will learn the fight together for the greater cause of freedom.

title: The Marshmallow Ghosts Present Corpse Reviver No. 2
description: The Marshmallow Ghosts, Graveface Records' Halloween band, presents this omnibus of spooky music videos centered around a hearse tour company in Savannah, Georgia. The guide, Louis, recounts various Savannah ghost stories and legends to his seemingly lone patron, Paige. Her bizarre and dazzling visions make up the individual music videos, tied together by Louis' storytelling. "Hearse Song" sees a man at work being harassed by unseasonable trick-or-treaters. He meets an untimely, sugary end. "The Attic" features a little girl's psychedelic decomposition. A pig farmer and his brother perform at a carnival in "Pigman's Bridge," with grave results. A witchy fantasy for "Trick" takes a turn for the demonic. In "Wait for the Day," a lengthy hospital stay gives new meaning to "vegetative state." The hearse tour ends at a ghastly soiree for the video "White Satin Gown," where Paige immediately senses something is amiss. 'Corpse Reviver No. 2' is the 'other' side of The Marshmallow Ghosts debut.

title: My First Horror Movie
description: Who's to say what's 'good' and what's 'evil?' Certainly not the people who kill in the name of 'God'.

title: Zombies of the Tar Sands... Ep 1 to 8
description: Rantdog takes a 'poo' while Tar Zombies attacked his family. He consoles his guilt at a stripper bar. Smash, a vain and devious reporter, saves Rantdog from his decaying family values and an attack of his undead family. On the run, Smash asks how an 'idiot' could survived a Tar Zombie uprising. Rantdog asks Smash about her 'evil plan'. Awkward silence. They have sex and bake a cake. The undead family crashes the party. Rantdog vows to clean-up the dirty Tar Zombies. Smash phones Twitch, a megalomaniac banker. Twitch and his army of junior bankers set sail to save the Tar Zombies. Rantdog purchases train loads of soap. Smash, Twitch and the undead family race to stop Rantdog, the clean freak and anti-Tar Zombie terrorist.

title: Student Film
description: A Korean zombie coming-of-age story. Convenience store clerk/film student Mu-Young, gets a chance to make his first movie, a zombie melodrama. The dream project turns into a nightmare. Everything that can go wrong, does. Barely surviving his disastrous shoot, he comes to realize making a movie is like love, you can't do it alone. A movie for people who love movie making, making love and zombies.

title: Eye burnout
description: A company of four people go into the forest, after a few hours of walking they get lost and find an old house in which no one was there. The guys decided to spend the night in it, but at night they are stolen by a killer clown.

title: O Corvo
description: A man receives the visit of a black winged visitor which serves him as a reminder of his dead beloved and the impossibility of making amends.

title: Planting Sleep
description: In a land of chemical and harsh realities, Hess (Andrew Hamm) is driven by something inside him to disrupt his set path and change his being forever. Planting Sleep, Directed by Douglas Lawlor makes his film debut on 16mm with a surreal landscape of unexplainable sound and image being his final film of the VCU film program.

title: Vanityville Massacre
description: The ongoing war on terror has left the population of VanityVille in a desperate state of fear, denial, and blind worship. A nation disconnected, despondent, and insane finds sole sanctuary in spiritual materialism and the cult of beauty. VanityVille Massacre is a satirical Slash/Dance chronicling 24h in the lives of four unsuspecting popular girls - Brandy, Christina, Paris and Britney -- who, in a moment of foolishness unleash the unforgettable and spine-tingling saga of a young women whose twisted obsessions and diabolical delusions leave the girls in a state of unspeakable horror. VanityVille Massacre showcases slashing choreography with original music. This conceptual thriller will keep you on the edge of your seat - and your sanity. Sometimes beauty is best left in the eye of the beholder...

title: In the Ranaissance
description: She was born in the Renaissance, but wasn't everyone?

title: Terrorville
description: 5 people receive a mysterious invitation to a dinner party at an isolated mansion. Little do they know what is in store for them. In the midst of dinner; a dead body abruptly crashes through the ceiling. The guests then realize that they are trapped in this mansion - pawns of someone's cruel game. Before they can react to this shocking turn of events, the effects of the drugged meal seep in. They each black out. And the fun begins

title: Maslow's Lab
description: Traumatized by the accidental death of his niece on Easter Day, a man is trapped inside a laboratory run by a mad psychiatrist specialized in intensive phobia treatments.

title: Cwazy Wabbit
description: A cuddly toy rabbit sits in the attic talking about how his owner doesn't love him anymore.

title: The Evil Dread
description: A short supernatural thriller that brings the fear of an unknown pursuer to a young couple leaving for a camping trip.

title: Art Insular
description: Arthur is a neat and reclusive young man, with a large growth on his head that has caused him to withdraw from society. When he meets the charming Sarah, his growth takes on a life of its own.

title: The Keening
description: Direct to DVD feature film. The Keening is a supernatural horror film.

title: Luminous
description: Luminous is a short narrative film from the perspective of Sam, a young boy who runs into a dark forest to escape from his abusive father. The story melds one boy's fears with the surreal world that lies beneath.

title: Minion
description: When the babysitter comes to watch young Tommy, she may regret looking after him.

title: Life Among the Undead
description: Ryan Mcgivern (A Gothic Tale) writes, directs, and stars as "KURT BOHL" in this 70's drive thru B Art Horror film that pushes the boundaries of humanity. "Life Among the Undead" will take you to depravity, beauty, and everything in between. Also starring Destiny Soria and Ben Watson as the depraved lunatic "Jack".

title: Elder Growth
description: A found film documenting a graduate student's attempt to find a tree thought long extinct from this earth. Bringing her camera man and lover into the old growth forest, their search brings them face to face with ancient horrors not of this world. Can anyone hide... when the trees have eyes?

title: Ballet d'action
description: The ballet dancer Elias is seeking the truth about his girlfriends death. The journey takes him closer to a part of himself then to the answer about his girlfriend.

title: Garú
description: The worst curse of being a werewolf is in its entirety, to have been a human being.

title: Guerilla
description: Tired with a life of no-budget short films, Wesley has finally made the decision to make the next acting gig his last.

title: Roachfar
description: ROACHFAR is a surreal short film from writer/director Steven Cerritos that follows a peculiar old man's descent into madness.

title: The Drachen Recruitment Experiment
description: Down on his luck and out of work, Chad answers an ad in the back of a newspaper attempting to recruit subjects for medical research involving torture.

title: THE Shinrei Shashin: Anata no Shiranai Sekai
description: Among the myriad of photographs that exist, there are some that cannot be explained in words. People who should not be there, strange patterns, deformed heads, too many limbs. Here are 44 of those photos, carefully selected.

title: Super Death Kill
description: In the post-apocalyptic world of the near future, a man from the Southern Wastelands responds to an ad for a day labor job-and finds himself trapped in a tournament with the only choices being fight or die.

title: Fuuin Eizou 5: Love Hotel no Onnen
description: 5th entry in the 'Sealed Video' franchise from the production team of 'Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video'.

title: Fuuin Eizou 6: Noroi no Power Spot
description: 6th entry in the 'Sealed Video' franchise from the production team of 'Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video'.

title: Salivate
description: A dark comedy about dysfunctional relationships, sexual hang ups, and vampires.

title: Days of the Fog
description: A fog covers the city of Aberdeen in Scotland, mutating inhabitants, resulting in the inevitable struggle between good and evil mutants.

title: Roaming Beasts of Terror
description: It's about a Werewolf attacking a city suburb. Two Supernatural hunters track it down in an attempt to stop it.

title: Disney World
description: The representation of being in motion picture is the direct result of an inflated super ego, a facade that coats the real in an illusion of impenetrable madness and gives birth to the Super Id. We are in an inorganic suspension by which we must posit nothingness onto the world in order to understand ourselves as being. It is this nothingness that we project, from the screens in Hollywood to the streets of New York City, that will lead to an inevitable collapse of the systems of meaning as they fall pray to the cancer of representation. We are now in the Warholian mode of being, and the avant-garde has not reacted against the banality that now coats our existence. Everything is now Disney World.

title: Silly Scaries
description: Three silly and scary tales: Manna For The Damned, Treehuggers and Dead Ending.

title: Zombeer
description: In an attempt to create the world's first addictive beer, an evil brew master tests his diabolical suds on his unsuspecting roommates. Immediately after the beer his their lips they turn ravenous, desperately and maniacally drinking as fast and hard as they can. Before they know it the beer has run out and they must resort to other means to get their fix.

title: One Week in Windchocombe
description: Five people who try to spend a week in the most haunted house in Canada, are terrorized by visions, madness and demonic forces.

title: The Unseen
description: The Unseen is a short film dealing with a young girls confrontation with a life or death decision, and the supernatural battle that rages around her.

title: Who Else to Blame?
description: What will happen when the killer decides to take on a new victim?

title: Midnight Snack
description: Dylan receives a menacing phone call from a dead girl, only to find out that she's in need of a 'midnight snack.'

title: Back to the Beyond
description: When a paranormal research team investigates a haunting dramatized on a classic television series, they encounter a sinister supernatural force thought to be fictional.

title: Meat Stick Man
description: A dark take on those old 'Snap into a Slim Jim ads.' Meat Stick Man bursts into a young boys room in the middle of the night to personally feed his hunger, only to find the boy ungrateful and uncooperative. That's not going to stop HIM though.

title: Because You're a Stranger
description: A recreation of a nightmare the director when she was eight, involving the threat of being kidnapped by a stranger.

title: Paper Run
description: A short horror film, in the style of Living Doll (Trilogy of Terror) and Child's Play, starring Hamish Howes and Finlay Quilter and introducing 'Binky'. Two teenage boys make an intriguing discovery on their morning paper run. Little do they know, they've unleashed a powerful evil and they're in for some very bad news.

title: Alligator Bitch
description: A woman confronts her possible identity through a nightmarish push-pull while losing her grip on reality.

title: Cursed: Sheol
description: A young journalist named Jin Duyen is holding her own investigation of the murder case. With the police covering up details she ventures out to the scene of the crime and has a frightening encounter. Then, after returning home, she realizes that something has followed her, and she's somehow become "Cursed" due to her involvement. Meanwhile, the wife of Lieutenant Magnus, an investigator on the case, has been experiencing hauntings at work the last few weeks since the murder. She and her husband seek to find the cause before the creepy occurrences become lethal.

title: The Accomplice
description: In the business Carl Jones and Jake Sully find themselves in they have become loyal errands boys for their boss, Robert Paulson, who aims to destroy the world with a deadly virus. The boss's need to pay off the destruction of society leads him to reach into the town's depths of crime. Every small time criminal from the big time robbers to the low down drug deals get taken over by Paulson's wrath of control. Carl and Sully run into trouble causing them to question each others moralistic viewpoints, while Paulson is about to reveal his virus to the public.

title: Snake
description: A man visits his mother in order to comfort her concerning the recent death of his father. While visiting, he begins to slowly go insane due to the small apartment and the haunting nature of the city she lives in.

title: Daemoniac
description: A heart transplant that was supposed to be life saving turns out to be life-threatening when a girl begins to suspect her donor may have been a victim of demonic possession. She sets out on a mission to try to discover the truth before it's too late.

title: The Meat Eater
description: Part of JABB pictures breakthrough short film collection The Collective, The Meat Eater is a tale of the last man left in a town devastated by a beast like killer. After several unsuccessful attempts to kill the beast, the man knows a final showdown is inevitable.

title: The Perfect Man?
description: My short film is about a world where androids have been 'perfected' to the point where people can use them to do all sorts of small tasks. Unfortunately, as with anything, nothing is 'perfect', and when left to their own devices, these 'perfect' beings can make horrible decisions.

title: Lana Turner Overdrive
description: Screen legend Lana Turner takes a hallucinogen-fueled journey deep into her own inland empire in this two part cut-up from director Michael Frost. In the first part, life becomes stage becomes cinema as Lana spins out of control over loss, regret, spiteful teenage vampire stepdaughters and LSD. The second half probes deeper into the Lana myth with this revealing excursion into her self-imposed exile.

title: T is for Trash Can
description: Scott is just a typical guy, taking out a typical bag of garbage, on a typical night.

title: She
description: The sting of love drives a man to madness.

title: Raw Footage
description: This cinema-verite film tells the story of found footage discovered at a couple's home. They document their encounter against an unspeakable, otherworldly evil.

title: Relentless
description: On what was meant to be a romantic afternoon in the picturesque Blue Mountains, Ashley finds herself the next target of a sadistic killer, who has been watching her every move for months. Alone and fighting against the unrelenting wilderness, Ashley must outwit and outsmart her predator, or share the gruesome fate of his previous victims.

title: Gory Leslie
description: Is that chicken? Is Bret gonna be there? What's wrong with my face? Madd and Leslie enjoy the day and try not to ruin the party.

title: Dinner for Four
description: The most normal of people often hide the darkest secrets.

title: Fear in the Gorge
description: While on a hiking/fishing trip, four friends discover what they believe is Bigfoot in the gorge forest. One of the guys decides to shoot the beast and drag him back to town as ultimate proof that Bigfoot really does exist. But he ends up only wounding Bigfoot and then they lose track of the beast in the gorge forest. During the night the tables are turned and the four friends become the hunted.

title: Panic, Fear: Part One
description: A woman wakes up in her Los Angeles apartment. After using the bathroom, she goes to the kitchen for a late night snack. Leaving the kitchen, we get a glimpse of the man who will soon take her life. She gets into bed, only to realize that her husband has been murdered. The killer drags her back into the kitchen to end her life.

title: Street of Fools
description: When Harley Quinn lost his job, his world came apart. Now suffering a psychotic break, he decides that self-help books, positive affirmations, herbal tea, and a unusual occupation can bring him back to sanity. But delusion is part of his sickness, and it takes a deadly turn on the person he loves the most.

title: Coffee & Strippers
description: A Movie Matinee!SHORT: A brain-damaged coffee house owner hires an amnesiac CIA assassin and her undercover shadow, fights off insurgents from Starbucks, and keeps the place open 24/7/365 while trying to bring his wife back from the dead. INTERMISSIONFEATURE: Two directors - a slasher film hack and a Hollywood-endorsed prodigy - trapped third director, compete to provide the best death scenes.

title: Pennipotens
