description: 'Pennipotens' is based on the Flemish fairytale 'White Caroline and Black Caroline', first recorded by Edmund Dulac in 1916. Out of spite, a mother repeatedly tries to kill her 'beautiful' daughter, although her attempts are always secretly foiled by her beloved 'ugly' daughter.

title: Run with the Hare
description: What happens when a man gives into the temptations of greed? Cornwall believes that his lucky rabbit's foot empowers him to earn riches from a poker game. However, an encounter with an unwarranted visitor will make Cornwall repent for his vice, thus falling down his own rabbit hole.

title: Issues
description: A sex addict visits his psychiatrist who has some issues of her own.

title: By Observation Only
description: When a teen spends an afternoon alone after school, a dark spirit and a fly conspire to murder him to obtain his saxophone.

title: The Lonely Cell
description: Welcome to the 1 percent.

title: Project Ryan
description: Four people discover a personal connection to poltergeist disturbances while filming a documentary for a private missing persons investigation.

title: Bartender
description: Sydney has been stood, but not even she knows how close her relationship to the bartender really is.

title: Amy Goes to College
description: Amy goes to college, makes some friends, has some fun, loses her mind, buries her friends.

title: The Cradle Will Fall
description: A young girl phones the emergency services in distress. The police arrive to find someone who isn't what they first appear.

title: The Hauntings at the Bryn Du Mansion
description: A team of paranormal investigators examine the haunting at Bryn Du Mansion in Granville, Ohio,

title: Fools
description: A college juggling group unknowingly saves the life of a strange monster. Suddenly the group is pushed into a battle of good and evil. After being given strange weapons of their own, the jugglers face off against monsters to protect our world. Fools mixes b-horror mentality and comedy into a sure audience pleaser.

title: The Mill
description: A film crew follows the path of a paranormal team, who is investigating the anniversary of a ghoulish massacre.

title: Nighttime
description: A girl dealing with a post-traumatic experience during the hours before sunrise.

title: Die Pig Die!
description: A short film shot in the style of 1950s b-movies. The film was shot in my garage with forced perspective sets and green screen. The film is a dark comedy about a woman with a split personality dealing with daily harassment by men by acting out fantasies of killing pig-monster men.

title: Evidence of the Sasquatch
description: Four filmmakers embark on a location scout deep in to the Pacific Northwest wilderness, while documenting their progress they capture evidence of a deadly forest creature.

title: Nightgaunts
description: A short video adaptation of H P Lovecraft's poem, with stop-motion animated creatures.

title: Dead Is Dead Again
description: Eric Shepherd comes to realize that the Doxital drug he has been injected with causes bizarre side effects.

title: Noctambulous
description: A man mourning the death of his wife battles a severe sleepwalking problem while exploring the darkness of his soul through alcohol and anonymous sex.

title: Kotoribako
description: The cursed box will annihilate your family - The most terrifying urban legend in the history of the Internet is finally unleashed.

title: Amanda Laru
description: A psychiatric patient's attempt to reintegrate herself into society, leads to her winning a role in a film. She soon finds herself in an unexpected tryst with the director, which triggers her mentally incarcerated boyfriend to escape, stalk her, and re-adopt his murderous ways.

title: The Ghost of Randall Bowers
description: Two college women start a vlog on the haunted disturbances taking place inside their dorm.

title: Horror: The Movie
description: The first Anthology in the Darkest corners film series. Five short stories of horror and the supernatural.

title: Beyond the Realm
description: Three Tales of the Supernatural.

title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 44
description: 44th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series.

title: In the End
description: As their far from normal relationship comes to an end, Ada and Chase discuss the events that led them to that point.

title: L.A.G.P.
description: Los Angeles Ghost Patrol reality TV pilot footage.

title: The Possession in Japan
description: Young Lisa reaches 20 years of age and begins to suffer from an unusual phenomenon that causes her face to become more and more disfigured by the day. Diagnosed with schizophrenia, Lisa undergoes treatment but gets steadily worse. When evidence suggests that she is possessed by the devil, Lisa's father tries to exorcise the evil spirits in a life and death battle for her immortal soul!

title: Shelf Life
description: When two hikers fall ill from touching a mysterious object, environmental agents (Luis & Steph) are called in to investigate. They meet up with local guide Johnny 'Quickfoot' Snow and tells them about the legend of East Berry Trail. Despite warnings and the dangers, the three continue their quest and will soon find out that the legend is real.

title: Ocaso
description: A local TV crew is shooting a documentary about paranormal phenomena and reach a town partially under water, left behind in ruins by their own people in 1940 after the Civil War, where they will be trapped.

title: Hide and Seek
description: When Curtis needs a friend the most a mysterious email makes him realize to be careful what you wish for.

title: The Lost Children
description: Running from her troubled family, New York City Socialite Evelyn Hamilton joins the Lost Children cult, where she surpasses the cult leader and comes to believe in her own mystical origin and powers.

title: Cold Blood
description: Famous Vampire Film Director and Star 'Elias Mortenson' continues his Auditions throughout London, Belfast, Cardiff and LA looking 'American Idol' style for the next 'Vampire Star' for his next movie in the sequel to the original film 'Audition for a Vampire' Having left, in his 'auditions' wake, new born, blood hungry Vampires, we watch as the Belfast Brood begin to deal and cope with their new found condition. However they may be blessed by Northern Ireland's 30 years of 'Troubles' as they realize that they can use paramilitary murders as a cover for their 'Blood Lust' This is the continuation of the series.

title: The Closet
description: A little girl keeps hearing something in the closet - what could it be?

title: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi No Video 43
description: 43th entry in the popular "Honto ni Atta. Noroi no Video" series.

title: Scavengers
description: Who are you when you are alone, desperate? A video of detachment--from death, from others, from self, from life.

title: Revisited
description: Two college students and a young teenage boy are terrorized by paranormal forces.

title: David Dixon Is Dead.
description: 'David Dixon is dead.' is a documentary of past events and of events that have yet to come. Therefore, it is a fiction, but one built solidly on the real-life public declaration by its maker, David Dixon, which states that after his death his head should be removed from his body and cleaned to the skull, the skull then included in an art piece. The film explores the implications of this declaration, going so far as to kill its maker, opening the film to a fictive future where the filmmaker's father comes to New York City to deal with his son's final dispensation, ultimately leading to Oklahoma City, Dixon's head now in a cooler.

title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: The Nightsisters Trilogy
description: A home video compilation film of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episodes "Nightsisters," "Monster," and "Witches of the Mist," cut together. Originally shown at select screenings in 2010 (mainly at conventions), and it was published as an iTunes digital download on December 5, 2011.
